remarks.format: ## Remarks 基底實作轉譯`< card >`項目，以指定的屬性。The base implementation renders a `< card >` element with the given attributes. 繼承的介面卡，可以覆寫這個方法，並修改之屬性的字典，然後再呼叫基底實作。Inheriting adapters can override this method and modify the dictionary of attributes, before calling the base implementation.
